snippet.title: Fluffy Sailors - Official Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Wishlist Fluffy Sailors now on Steam: 
https://store.steampowered.com/app/2887350/Fluffy_Sailors/

Visit the Skaldery Games home page:
https://skalderygames.com/fluffy-sailors/

In a world of spherical, fluffy animals, you set sail to rescue the Mouse Queen's royal chef from the clutches of alligators. Prepare for challenging sea battles, picturesque island landscapes, and ships that can only exist in a world of fluffy animal pirates!

#fluffysailors #indiegame #trailer
